channel.title: Piacine on 2021 Design Refresh
channel.description: Recent content in Piacine on 2021 Design Refresh

item.title: comfy spot
item.description: Week 14: Absolute Fire. This art was lovingly created using: Procreate. Artist’s Notes The fire is warm, comforting, bright. Just warms your cold toes and the tip of the nose after a cold walk along the beach at night time. Social Media N/A. Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer. Parsed source from Discord is as follows: Week 14 Title: comfy spot Medium: Procreate Description: The fire is warm, comforting, bright.

item.title: Life of Avocados
item.description: Week 13: Look At Me. This art was lovingly created using: Procreate. Artist’s Notes The daily life of avocados. Here I will present to you today, to make you all aware of how appalling avocado cruelty really is and why it must be stopped. #savetheavocados (My imagination when I was working on an avocado farm) Social Media N/A. Other Edit this page on GitHub .
